##Baseball 1980 Team Homeruns

df<-Teams%>%
  filter(yearID==1980)%>%
  select(name,HR)%>%
  arrange(HR)

str(df$name)
class(df$name)
factor(df$name)

df$name<-factor(df$name,levels = df$name)

## Visualize the data

ggplot()+
  geom_bar(data = df,aes(x=name,y=HR),stat = "identity", color = "blue", fill="white")+
  coord_flip()+
  ggtitle("1980 Team Homeruns ")+
  xlab("Homeruns")+
  ylab("Team")
